message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. This is a competitive price, considering its worth to you is $10000. I believe it's a fair deal and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10250. This is still a great deal, considering its worth to you is $10000. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from there, so I'll offer $9750. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
